name: router-performance-check
description: Performance comparison between React Router and Tanstack Router

scripts.build: npm run build:react-router && npm run build:tanstack-router
scripts.build:analyze: npm run build:analyze:react-router && npm run build:analyze:tanstack-router
scripts.install:all: npm run install:react-router && npm run install:tanstack-router
scripts.clean: npm run clean:react-router && npm run clean:tanstack-router
scripts.clean:react-router: cd react-router && rm -rf build dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:tanstack-router: cd tanstack-router && rm -rf build dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:react-router && npm run typecheck:tanstack-router
